name: VascularSurgeryICD9
title: Vascular Surgery ICD9
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values identifies patients who have a vascular surgery procedure.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have a vascular surgery procedure.  Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element will map to the Procedure category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Only use codes which represent vascular surgery procedures.  Codes used are to be ICD9CM codes only.),(Exclusion Criteria: Exclude codes that do not meet the inclusion criteria.   Exclude codes that represent a vascular surgery performed using a scope.)
